Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/16/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $650,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1988, off Dennis Martinez (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/19/1988, off Calvin Schiraldi (NYM)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
